com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode

Interface AuthCodeListener

  • package com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode
public interface AuthCodeListener
    Interface for auth code callback. Success/error results are all received by the only method onAuthCodeReceived. This interface is subject to improvement in the future, when success/error can be converted to different classes, not same AuthorizationResult class. This interface is used internally only and subject to change.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void onAuthCodeReceived(int requestCode, AuthorizationResult result)
